divs: Sighting Detailswatching the Olympics about 10:30 one night, there was a shot of the Olympicflame from earlier in the day, i guess. anyhow it was very clear a light shotacross the screen. it was very fast, and in a straight line, obviously wasnt asnowflake, of anything like that. I couldnt have been the only one to see it. It was on the channel that Bob Costas(NBC?) was on.
